casebody.data:
Samuel H. Randall, Respondent v. Jacob A. Sherman, and another, Appellants. Decided January 11, 1892. Appeal by defendants from order of reference. Leavitt & Keith, attorneys, and John Brooks Leavitt of counsel, for appellants. Samuel H. Randall, attorney in person, for respondent.

Before Freedmen, P. J., and Gildersleeve, J.

Per Curiam.

Order affirmed, with $10 costs.
